wikipedia_page.main: Joshua James Rowbotham (born 7 January 1994) is an English footballer who plays as a defender for Marske United.

response: Born in Krugersdorp, South Africa, Holden made his senior debut for English club Hartlepool United in April 2011 in a 1–1 draw, with other debutants Andy Rafferty and Josh Rowbotham, against Tranmere Rovers.
